Reason: The _snapshotSerializers configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly affects the behavior of creating and managing Prevayler instances, which can have a significant impact on system performance, reliability, and data integrity. The configuration involves setting up the snapshot manager, transaction publisher, server listener, journal serializer, and transaction deep copy mode, which are all critical components that can contribute to time-expensive and memory-expensive operations. Any variations in these operations can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, making this configuration performance-sensitive.
